content: materials - purl soho s good wool 1 100% andean highland wool yarn each skein of this sport- to light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 383 yards/ 100 grams main color 1 skein approximately 95 120 155 195 245 total yards required we used the colors yellow olive fresh loganberry and pink salt contrast color 1 skein approximately 5 yards required we used dark spruce with yellow olive wild guava with fresh loganberry and olive oil with pink salt - us 3 3 25 mm 12- or 16-inch circular knitting needles 2 or us 3 32-inch circular needles for magic loop 3 - us 4 3 5 mm 12- or 16-inch circular needles or us 4 32-inch circular needles for magic loop - if using short circular needles a set of us 4 double pointed needles 4 - stitch markers 5 including one unique gauge 26 stitches and 38 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch on larger needles sizes baby toddler kid adult small adult large to fit actual head circumference of 14 16 16 18 18 20 20 22 22 24 inches - finished circumference 13½ 14¾ 16 18½ 21 inches - finished height 5½ 6½ 7¾ 8¾ 9½ inches sample our samples are all the adult small size pattern designed and written by purl soho designer gianna mueller 6 see even more of gianna s work on her instagram 7 1 https //www purlsoho com/good-wool html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/magic-loop/ 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles html 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_markers html 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 7 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
